original_text: With each bull and with the male sheep, you must give a grain offering. Mix together 3 kilograms of the best flour with olive oil. Offer it to me with each bull. Mix together 2 kilograms of the best flour with olive oil. Offer it to me with the male sheep.
korean_text: 매 수송아지에는 고운 가루 십분의 삼에 기름 섞은 소제와 숫양 한 마리에는 고운 가루 십분의 이에 기름 섞은 소제와

sentences.original_text: With each bull and with the male sheep
you must give a grain offering
Mix together 3 kilograms of the best flour
Offer it to me with each bull
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 각 수소와 함께 나에게 바쳐라

sentences.original_text: Mix together 2 kilograms of the best flour
Offer it to me with the male sheep
